def main():
    a, p = map(int, input().split())
    print(p // 2 + (a + p % 2) * 3 // 2)


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

# Receive input
A, P = map(int, input().split())
# Calculate the maximum number of apple pies we can make with what we have now
apple_pies = A*3 + P//2
# Print the result
print(apple_pies)

def main():

    print(p // 2 + (a + p % 2) * 3 // 2)
